3+ years experienced AI/ML engineer. I believe that AI will change our lives more comfortable. During working at NAVER, I realize AI needs not only model structure but also automated pipeline for maintaining model performance. Currently, my research is focused on how to maintain the model performance with smaller budget (e.g. labelling cost). For deploying AI services using ML pipeline, moreover, I'm participating some AI service project such as face sign. If you want to know more about my work history, please download my CV .
